pkgmetadata.longdescription: eQ-3/ELV MAX! Cube Python API |Build Status| |Coverage Status|===============================================================A python api to control the Max! Cube thermostats:- get basic info about the cube itself- get info about the max thermostats connected to the cube (mode, temperatures ...)Basic usage:.. code:: python from maxcube.cube import MaxCube cube = MaxCube('192.168.0.20') for device in cube.devices: print(device.name) print(device.actual_temperature)This api was build for the integration of the Max! thermostats into `Home Assistant <https://home-assistant.io>`__ andmostly only covers the functions needed for the integration.It does also include functions needed to save and restore thermostat programmes. For example:.. code:: shell # dump programmes (and other data) to a JSON file python3 prog.py dump --host=192.168.0.11 > backup.json # load programmes (not other data!) from a JSON file python3 prog.py load --host=192.168.0.11 < backup.jsonRunning tests=============.. code:: python python3 -m unittest discover tests/Acknowledgements================Thanks to:- `https://github.com/Bouni/max-cube-protocol <https://github.com/Bouni/max-cube-protocol>`__- `https://github.com/ercpe/pymax <https://github.com/ercpe/pymax>`__- `https://github.com/aleszoulek/maxcube <https://github.com/aleszoulek/maxcube>`__- `openhab integration <https://github.com/openhab/openhab2/tree/master/addons/binding/org.openhab.binding.max>`__.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/hackercowboy/python-maxcube-api.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/hackercowboy/python-maxcube-api.. |Coverage Status| image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/hackercowboy/python-maxcube-api/badge.svg?branch=master&service=github :target: https://coveralls.io/github/hackercowboy/python-maxcube-api?branch=master
